channel.title: 637 kill reward system
channel.description: All I want to do is put in a system that adds coins to the inventory after a player kills another player. I think it should be something like if player is killed, then give x coins. the problem is I don't know what the exact code would be, or even the classes for them... Also where would I put it? I'm a newb so please help :)
